edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign

Class TPHandlerFE1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign.TPHandler
      • edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.hmmalign.TPHandlerFE1

  • public class TPHandlerFE1
extends TPHandler
    This handles the translation probability for the model p(fj,tfj|aj,e,te)=p(tfj|teaj)p(fj|eaj,[teaj,tfj])
    Author:
    Kristina Toutanova (kristina@cs.stanford.edu)
